job.title: Jr Software Engineer
job.description:
Job Description:   - A computer science (or equivalent) background with good C# coding skills around development/test-automation (2+ years) is a must   
  - Strong PowerShell or other scripting skills   
  - Good knowledge on Linux.    
  - Understanding of hardware and multi-processing systems   
  - Cloud systems exposure & experience is valuable.    
  - SQL Server, or other database exposure and/or experience   
  - Platform management   
  - Application development   
  - Testing   
  - Performance engineering skill sets will be a bonus.
